\newcommand{\ftensor}[1]{\mathbb{#1}}

\newcommand{\epsp}[0]{\underline{\underline{\varepsilon}}^p} % version 1
\newcommand{\sigm}[0]{\mathcal{\boldsymbol{\sigma}}}
